contents:
There was forty feet between them when they stopped to make their play
And the swiftness of the boomer is still talked about to-day
Zoomer had not cleared leather when a bullet fairly ripped
And the boomer aim was deadly with the big iron on his hip
Big iron on his hip
It was over in a moment and the folks had gathered round
There before them lay the body of the virgin on the ground
Oh he might have gone on living but he made one fatal slip
When he tried to match the boomer with the big iron on his hip
Big iron on his hip
